about_the_game:
Get a new view to the apocalypse with the Camera Effects DLC! This DLC allows you to enhance the default camera view with new animated effects.

This DLC includes the following camera effects:
Horror - A classic black and white film look with animated details.
CCTV - Emulates a CCTV camera with distortion.
Manga - Modifies the graphics to look more like a hand-drawn horror comic book.

You can change these effects in the Options Menu from the Main Menu. Please note, these effects may cause other effects not to show completely and some game features are disabled while using them, which will increase the game difficulty.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains violence and gore against humans and monsters.

detailed_description:
Get a new view to the apocalypse with the Camera Effects DLC! This DLC allows you to enhance the default camera view with new animated effects.

This DLC includes the following camera effects:
Horror - A classic black and white film look with animated details.
CCTV - Emulates a CCTV camera with distortion.
Manga - Modifies the graphics to look more like a hand-drawn horror comic book.

You can change these effects in the Options Menu from the Main Menu. Please note, these effects may cause other effects not to show completely and some game features are disabled while using them, which will increase the game difficulty.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu (64-bit)
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 750 TI / AMD Radeon R9 270X
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
  • Additional Notes: Plays best with an Xbox One gamepad
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu (64-bit)
  • Processor: Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290X
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Hardware
  • Additional Notes: Plays best with an Xbox One gamepad
